definition: number of degrees/reading (on a meter)/strength (alcohol, lenses etc)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The fifth column shows the degrees where rulership by term transfers.
sentences.chinese: 第五列的說明的是關於度數的每個區間的守護星體。

sentences.english: Brandy and Maotai are too high degress , I can't.
sentences.chinese: 白蘭地和茅臺度數太高了，我不行。

sentences.english: Reports that will show Mirror mirror on the degree of body temperature.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱，鏡面上會顯示鏡中人體溫的度數。

sentences.english: Why myopic can lens of seldom Dai Yan deepen degree?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼近視了不常戴眼鏡會加深度數？

sentences.english: That's how many steps your average person is away from Kevin Bacon.
sentences.chinese: 這就是一般人離Kevin，Bacon的度數。

sentences.english: CCT will become thicker and thicker as myopia diopter increases.
sentences.chinese: CCT隨近視眼患者屈光度數的增加有變薄的趨勢。

sentences.english: The thermometer reached the minimum for the year.
sentences.chinese: 寒暑表降到當年最低度數。

sentences.english: You may need frequent changes to your eyeglasses prescription.
sentences.chinese: 你可能須要經常更改鏡片的度數。

sentences.english: It becomes even longer, soon creating the need for stronger glasses.
sentences.chinese: 伸長，甚至再伸長，眼鏡的度數很快加深。

sentences.english: How strong are your glasses?3 diopters.
sentences.chinese: 你眼鏡度數多高？屈光度爲3。

sentences.english: Subjective cyclodeviations and binocular vision function were assessed by synoptophore.
sentences.chinese: 使用同視機檢查主觀旋轉度數和雙眼視覺功能。

sentences.english: The Tropic of Cancer is the most northerly latitude in the Northern Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 地球緯度是從赤道向南或向北以度數來表示。

sentences.english: Some scholars think that this li wine was similar to beer because of its low alcoholic content.
sentences.chinese: 一些學者認爲，醴酒類似於啤酒，因爲它的度數很低。

sentences.english: I can't read what the thermometer says.
sentences.chinese: 我不會看溫度表上的度數。

sentences.english: Do you know the degree of the round angle?
Can good eyesight glasses fall really degree?
sentences.chinese: 好視力眼鏡真的能降度數嗎？

definition: to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
